title: 97/249/EC: Commission Decision of 25 March 1997 amending Commission Decision 92/452/EEC establishing lists of embryo collection teams and embryo production teams approved in third countries for export of bovine embryos to the Community (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 25 March 1997 amending Commission Decision 92/452/EEC establishing lists of embryo collection teams and embryo production teams approved in third countries for export of bovine embryos to the Community (Text with EEA relevance) (97/249/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
In part 3 of the Annex to Decision 92/452/EEC, in respect of the United States of America:
(a) the following teams are added:
>TABLE>
(b) the following team is deleted:
>TABLE>
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 25 March 1997.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 302, 19. 10. 1989, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 53, 24. 2. 1994, p. 23.
(3) OJ No L 250, 29. 8. 1992, p. 40.
(4) OJ No L 36, 6. 2. 1997, p. 31.
